CustomField.formula: If( OR(DoNotCall=True, Account.Do_Not_Call__c= True),(IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif","red", 20,20)), IF(Sensitivity_BeneTrac__c=True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF( Sensitivity_Icon__c =True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), Null)))
CustomField.label: Do Not Call Flag
